Detailed Description

Many examples of usage of the c_hdf_reader library.

Author:
Nicolas PASCAL (nicolas.pascal@icare.univ-lille1.fr), (C) Centre de Gestion et de Traitement de Données (CGTD) ICARE 2008
Version:
0.0.0
Date:
2008/02/25
Copyright: See COPYING file that comes with this distribution

History : v0.0.0 : creation

This program lists some examples of basic usage of HDF4 files. This includes :

  • display a description about an HDF type code
  • retrieve the list of SDS and the list of file attributes of an HDF file
  • read a file attribute
  • read a SDS attribute
  • read an uncalibrated SDS data
  • read a SDS calibration
  • read an calibrated SDS data
